item.title: Top DNC official demands Dems be 'more aggressive,' compares Trump admin to popular carjacking video game
item.description: Malcolm Kenyatta urges Democrats to fight harder against Republicans as DNC faces fundraising challenges and declining poll numbers heading into the 2...

item.title: ‘Nonsensical’ illegal immigrant tuition policy scrapped in Kentucky, Bondi lawsuit deal
item.description: Kentucky becomes latest state to end in-state tuition for illegal immigrants following Justice Department legal action over federal law violations.

item.title: Trump says he will require voter ID with executive order
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will sign an executive order mandating voter ID and limiting mail-in voting, despite court ruling earlier this year.

item.title: Trump nominees squeezed between 'blue slips' and blue obstruction
item.description: Senate Republicans defend blue slip tradition requiring home state approval for Trump's judicial and attorney nominees despite president's attacks.

item.title: Chicago police will not collaborate with National Guard, federal agents if Trump moves on deployment: mayor
